data.name: Space Control VR
data.detailed_description:
To stay updated follow us on Twitter and join our Discord!



So, some invasion stuff went down and humanity lost, so now you’re stuck on a big dumb space station run by your new overlords, the Galactic Federation. They’ve got you working as a border control officer checking alien IDs and deciding who’s allowed in and who gets shipped back to their home planets. All-in-all a pretty standard job, except you can’t leave your booth because you’re also required to eat, sleep, and relieve yourself there. Federation policy.

You Ready To Control Some Space?

Lots to do. Who’s that sleepy old passport-stamping clerk? Not you, pal! This is an alien space station. There’s futuristic buttons to push and levers to pull and whirly knobs to doink.

The adventure comes to YOU. On one hand you’re confined to a booth. On the other hand, you’ve got a front row seat to an epic space opera. And on yet a third hand, you’ll have to react and make decisions based on unfolding events.

Leisure time. When the day is through you’re free to kick back and relax in the cramped living area directly behind your desk. Explore! Play! Shop! Or indulge your creative side with crayons that scream.

Merciful punishment. The Federation understands that mistakes happen. That’s why all executions are followed by a swift re-cloning of the perpetrator. You’ll be dead and back to work in no time.

Other Things In The Game


  • 10+ unique alien races with different criteria to check
  • Original multi-episode podcast
  • Radioactive candy bribes
  • Immersive waste disposal system
  • Alien clone babies
  • Gang affiliated balloons
  • A huge gun
  • A hydraulic press
  • A tasteful selection of joke posters
  • Derrick



  • Full release: late 2023
  • Free Demo contains the first day of the game.
  • Note: This game is VR only.

Join our Discord server for any questions or support! We appreciate you ♥

data.short_description: Space Control is the comedy VR game that makes you feel like you’re in a cartoon show. 'Volunteer' for an amazing job, meet a cast of aliens and adapt to life on their absurd space station.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!

content_descriptors.notes: Some gun violence and profanity. Adult themes can be discussed in dialogue.
